item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello World! Welcome to the Deepred site. There isn’t much to see here yet, but you can check out the about page for more information.

item.title: Blacklisted Modifications
item.description: In order to keep deepred fair and open to everyone, we have a blacklist of modifications that we determined to be an unfair advantage to vanilla players. What we allow Fate client Onix client What we don’t allow Zephyr client Horion Brush Strike Packet Client Chronos Cyan X-RAY texturepacks And many more… How to determine if a modification is going to get you banned Ask yourself these questions: Does this give me an unfair advantage?

item.title: Contacting us
item.description: If you have encountered an issue or want to report a rulebreaker, please do it on our discord or contact us via email. Instructions for how to contact us are below. Discord Our discord is located at https://discord.gg/FwzP5DPMUa Email Our email is located at support@deepred.club

item.title: Deepred
item.description: Hello there! Welcome to the one and only Deepred site. About us We are a passionate group of Minecraft fans who try making the MCBE server landscape a better place for everyone, without predatory pay-to-win server owners. Staff team We have a team of dedicated staff members who are always working to make the server a better place for everyone. Arian, Nic_ and the rest of the staff team are all here to help you if you need help.

item.title: Ingame rules
item.description: No spamming. Do not spam chat with your message. Once should be more than enough to get your point across. Respect & harrasment. We do not accept harassment regardless of circumstances. This is a serious offense which will get you banned. Unfair modifications. You are not allowed to use any sort of unfair modification, (e.g. Autoclicker). If you want to use a PVP client you are free to do so as long as it isn’t on our blacklist (https://deepred.
